DocAttribute.Name: DynamicViscosity
DocAttribute.Documentation: A measure of the viscous resistance of the material.

DocAttribute.Name: YoungModulus
DocAttribute.Documentation: A measure of the Young's modulus of elasticity of the material.

DocAttribute.Name: ShearModulus
DocAttribute.Documentation: A measure of the shear modulus of elasticity of the material.

DocAttribute.Name: PoissonRatio
DocAttribute.Documentation: A measure of the lateral deformations in the elastic range.

DocAttribute.Name: ThermalExpansionCoefficient
DocAttribute.Documentation: A measure of the expansion coefficient for warming up the material about one Kelvin.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR21
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Young modulus of a material may not be negative.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR22
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Shear modulus of a material may not be negative.
